pages.text: The $(d)Igniter$() can be used to light a fire when given a Redstone signal.$(br2)It has 3 modes, which you can cycle in its GUI.
pages.title: Igniter

pages.text: $(li)Toggle - Lights a fire when powered, and extinguishes it when unpowered.$(li)Keep Ignited - Keeps the fire lit while powered, and does nothing when unpowered.$(li)Ignite - Lights a fire when powered, and does nothing when unpowered.
